participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and imaginative, always looking for new adventures.
participant_1.background: I roll my dice, and imagine new worlds. I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation. I am allergic to shellfish. I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in. I work as an English teacher.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and introspective, values friendships deeply.
participant_2.background: I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion. I do not do my laundry as often as I should. I like football on TV. My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college. I have been married for five years.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for fun?
I like to watch football on TV and play video games.
Sounds fun! Have you ever been to a football game in person?
I have been to a few games, but I'm not a huge fan of crowds.
I understand that. I do not like going to crowded places either.
What do you do for work?
Oh, that's cool! I have always wanted to learn another language.
It is fun! I would recommend it.
Maybe I will look into it.
I am also allergic to shellfish. Have you ever had any bad reactions to it?
I have not, but I know it can be dangerous.
Yeah, it can be. I have to be very careful when I eat out.
I bet. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to read and build models.
That's cool! I used to build models when I was younger.
I still do it now. I am looking for a new home with a large room so I can build bigger models.
That's cool! I am sure you will find a great home.
